EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Breakfast: Driving Innovation with App Transformation Feat. Pivotal CTO APJ
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
I would like to invite you to be my guest at the upcoming event: Driving Innovation with Application Transformation
While evolving customer demands and increased competition drive organisations to place priority on business innovation, the reality is this effort is often hindered by developers working with legacy applications that reside on outdated platforms, use antiquated tools, are sparsely documented and require manual, lengthy processes. You may be missing out on critical product feedback loops due to difficulties in releasing frequent software deployments and therefore delivering a poor customer experience.
Join us for breakfast with your industry peers and our newly appointed Chief Technology Officer APJ, Lawrence Crowther, as we discuss how organisations can transform their legacy applications and business processes in order to accelerate their digital transformation journey and improve time, cost and operational efficiencies - while maintaining security and compliance.
Date: Tuesday, 2nd April 2019 Time: 8:30am - 10:15am (registration opens from 8am) Location: TEA ROOM, Adjacent Melbourne Supper Club, Level 1/161 Spring St, Melbourne VIC 3000
Register Now: https://connect.pivotal.io/Melbourne-Breakfast-April19.html
Agenda:
8:00am Registration 8:30am Opening Remarks 8:40am Why Your Organisation Needs Application Transformation, Lawrence Crowther, CTO APJ, Pivotal 9:10am AppTx Principles: How to Modernise Your Application Portfolio, Ramy El Essawy, Senior Platform Architect, Pivotal 9:40am Breakfast Served & Roundtable Discussion 10:05am Closing Remarks 10:15am Event Closure
Should you not be available to attend our Melbourne event, we are also hosting one in Sydney - Learn More: https://connect.pivotal.io/Sydney-Breakfast-March19.html
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
